resources.string: After the cloud recording is enable, the 4G camera will consume a large amount of data to upload recordings.\10The event recording upload is currently disabled by default. If you need to enable it, please go to the cloud recording settings to enable it.
After the cloud recording is enable, the camera will consume a large amount of data to upload recordings.You may incur huge expenses.

Try to keep Device close to router and mobile phone

If you find that the camera is out of focus during zooming, you can use this function to calibrate it.

1. Red light flashes quickly: connecting to the router. Red light flashes slowly: waiting for the network configuration.
2. Yellow light is always on: working normally. Yellow light is flashing: connecting to the Internet.
3. The indicator light is off: the device is sleeping or not working normally.

The device will enter standby mode to consume less power while working. Device will wake up automatically when triggered by PIR human detection.
The device will sleep in standby mode to consume less power while working. Device will wake up automatically when triggered by PIR human detection.
The device keeps working. Continuous recording can be enabled.
Switch the power supply mode, the device needs to be restarted
Adaptive power mode setting. When using DC power supply, the default mode is never sleep mode.
Switch to \"Never sleep mode\" when the battery is sufficient. Switch to \"Low-power mode\" when the battery is low.
When the battery is sufficient, it is in long power supply mode; when the battery is insufficient, it enters the energy saving mode
Please set the time interval first

After applying this mode, device will consume power faster. It is recommended to allocate the time interval reasonably and reduce the power consumption to increase the battery efficiency.\10Adaptive power mode is applied in the preset time interval, otherwise device applies Low-power mode.
OpenAuto Patrol camera will rotate automatically according the selected route.
The number of preset has reached the upper limit.
The device will perform PTZ calibration regularly every day
Turn on \"Automatic patrolling\", the device will cruise according to the preset route
The preset position has been set
Please rotate the PTZ, select the appropriate angle of view and set the preset position
Please set the patrol time period first
Time interval setting(no less than 1 minute)
There are preset positions in the set time period
if open“timing patrol”，device will process timing patrol model in priority.
If the Timing Guard is turned on, it will get priority to run first.
Please scan the QR code on the device.

1. Voice prompt of scanning successfully. \102. Try to keep your router, mobile phone and equipment close to each other. \103. The WiFi name and password cannot contain Chinese and special characters, and the WiFi password should be filled in correctly; \104. WiFi in the 5G signal is not currently supported, please use the applicable 2.4G WiFi signal; \105. Wifi outer Restrictions such as anti-rubbing network and AP isolation may cause connection failure. Please confirm the above situation and select the connection method after restoring the factory settings

1. Try to keep your router, mobile phone and device close to each other when connecting;\102. Don\'t use Chinese and special characters in the Wi-Fi name, and fill in the Wi-Fi password correctly.\103. The WiFi name and password cannot contain Chinese and special characters, and the WiFi password should be filled in correctly;\104. The router turns on the anti-rubbing network, AP isolation and other restrictions may cause the connection to fail.
Querying the version information, pls wait a minute.

1.If the microSD card reads and writes abnormally, please format the microSD card
2.The format of 32G and below is FAT32.
3.The format of 64G and above is exFAT.
5.Please be sure to use brand memory card.For inferior and refurbished card,compatibility is not guaranteed.

The device does not recognize the QR code

1. Please try to click on the QR code to zoom in,make sure camera lens toward the QR code, and adjust the distance (15cm~30cm) and angle between the phone screen and the camera lens. \102.The camera is in a backlight environment, which will reduce the scanning success rate

1. Please check whether the camera lens is blocked, tear off the lens protective film of the new device, and wipe the lens of the old device;\10\102. Please adjust the phone appropriately, make sure camera lens toward the QR code. Keep it at a distance of 10~30cm and adjust it appropriately until the device prompts Configuration received;\10\103. Please adjust the brightness of the phone to the maximum, and avoid the reflection of the screen.

1. Please ensure that the distance between the mobile phone and the device is close enough and there is no strong interference in the surrounding network environment.

2. Also confirm that the positioning rights of the V380 Pro application are not closed. If the app targeting permission is turned off manually, it may result in the inability to automatically query nearby devices.
3. If the device cannot be queried at all times, it may be because the device is switched to hotspot mode or configured in other ways because the device is not hotspot mode.
